title: Summertime (2012)
overview: Vicky and Sonia are two young girls who investigate the secret of a luxury house that killed several people. On his first night there will realize that things are not as they imagined ... are even better.  Norberto Ramos del Val, director of worship in the national series B, faces his fourth feature here in a spirit of the most pop and a tremendous desire to bring his unique vision of the film to the screen again. A shoot with small team, in a single location and at a speed impossible for mere mortals.
storyline: Two young females, Vicky and Sonia, investigate in a house where several people died, in their favorite bikinis and high heels, but after their first night they soon realize that things are not what they imagined when their find the script to the film.
